# Crosswalk templates
# - crosswalk_county_fips.csv: fips,state,county_name,population
# - crosswalk_hsa_to_county.csv: hsa,county_fips,county_name,state
# - crosswalk_state.csv: state_fips,state_abbrev,state_name,population
#
# Recommended sources:
# - FIPS/state/county: US Census Gazetteer / TIGER/Line
# - HSA definitions: AHRQ Maptitude/CCW documentation
# - Population: Census ACS / NCHS bridged race estimates
